author: Austen Hufford
title: Qualcomm Expands Licensing Deal With Samsung as Charges Cut Into Profit - WSJ
text:
Qualcomm Inc. entered into an expanded deal with one of its biggest customers and beat revenue estimates in its latest quarter even as it swung to a deep loss. 

Qualcomm said Wednesday that it had reached a multiyear deal with Samsung Electronics Co. that covers various areas including mobile devices. In addition, it said Samsung had agreed to withdraw its support for regulatory actions against Qualcomm in South Korea and elsewhere, a shift that could give it leverage as it appeals fines brought against it in recent years....
